<The Pollokshields Burgh Hall
2:
--------------------
Text: Pollokshields Burgh Hall:  The hall contained various council offices and a courtroom.

Triplets:<Pollokshields Burgh Hall
3:
--------------------
Text: Pollokshields Burgh Hall:  It continues to this day as a Masonic meeting place, hence the numerous Masonic symbols in the carvings (especially at the back of the building) and in the stained-glass windows.
Triplets:<Pollokshields Burgh Hall
